data.message: Hi... Why is facebook forcing me to used the messenger??? I can't open my messages on facebook. Is there a way to open my messages like before without going in to messenger???

replies.message: Hi Aj. We want to make everyday messaging fast, reliable, useful, and fun. We're confident Messenger is the way to do that. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2gRZsNz. You can also access your messages on the desktop site. Hope this helps! -Nick

I don't like being forced to use messenger either -it's invasive and take away up much needed room on my phone. Stop trying to force us to do things a lot of us don't want to do. BTW-it'sjust as fast to reply to a message on Facebook as it is on messenger.

Facebook Dear FACEBOOK TEAM,

I would like to ask you to reinstate the Facebook Page of SENYORA, url: https://www.facebook.com/SenyoraOfficial/

 SENYORA is a parody site in the Philippines that has been recently mass reported. SENYORA has brought joy and laughter to millions of Filipinos since it was created in 2013. Because the Page is such a hit, a publisher even compiled SENYORA's posts into a book entitled "Lakompake," published last year (http://www.nationalbookstore.com/books/lakompake-ang-babaeng-bukod-na-pinagpala-sa-lahat.html). 

I believe that SENYORA has been targeted because it's a Page that openly supports Duterte. This is definitely a POLITICALLY MOTIVATED mass report as SENYORA is one of the biggest Duterte Supporter FB Pages in the Philippines, with over 2 million followers.

Thank you.

I'm with Enrique Esteves 
Pls fb kindly do so...
Hi I looks your Facebook performance how you go uo please help me?
every time i try to get into facebook on my Account when i put my password in it says it is not the right password how do i correct this :(
